1514860.name: SuchArt - Supporter Pack
1514860.description:
If you sincerely enjoy playing SuchArt and want to make a contribution to the development of the game, you can support us by obtaining this pack — this will be a great contribution, we swear!

In return, you will get several items that will make your studio a bit cooler, such as:

  • Crabux Bucket
  • Crabux Plushie/Toy
  • Heart Pillow
  • Swag Large Brush

These items won’t drastically change the gameplay, but they will make you stand out from the crowd of those who don’t have them. And crabux are cute, right?
1514860.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
